textBox.richText: I Am Cell, We Are Zeitgeist: 9/5/08

here's the link for the new show: http://www.kdvs.org/shows/view/show_id/527/date/2008-09-05/ This week I actually had my shit together, so I managed to figure out what I was playing, set-up the playlist, and rip CDs all during my show.  I was definitely multi-tasking and busy for the whole three hours, didn't get much time to just chill and listen to it, but at least I was being efficient.  Try and figure out the relevance of the show picture.  I'll give you a hint: it has to do with context.  Unlimited scheduled dedicated mojo session for anyone who gets it. New Adds: HEALTH - Health//Disco Dangerdoom - The Mouse & The Mask Metal Fingers - Metal Fingers Presents:  Special Herbs, Vol 9 & 0 N.W.A. - Gangsta Gansta Psychokinetics - Seven League Boots Deerhunter - Cryptograms BOAT - Let's Drag Our Feet Blonde Redhead - 23 So, this was my 2nd to last show, I'm thinking last show I'll try and put in some effort and do like a best of first quarter DJ, but don't be dissappointed if I end up not prepping at all...  I asked some people if they keep up the old quarter links, and apparently the guy I was talking to still can access his from last year fall quarter, but I might try and achieve 'em somehow just to be safe.  Hopefully I'll get a solid slot next quarter... I need to get mad volunteer hours before the 10th... I'm pretty much talking to myself at this point... Happy listening, Ben
